context.p: Activities on StellarOne Servers and configuration deployed on the Agents by StellarOne are logged and shown in the Server Events screen.

step.cmd: Mouse hover the Logs tab in the top navigation bar of the StellarOne web console. Click the Server Events option.
Click the OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME or OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME tab, the configuration events deployed on the Agents by StellarOne appear.
Click the StellarOne tab, the StellarOne server event logs appear.
